attributes.title: my horse prince & music
attributes.review: when I downloaded this app and went to go play my horse prince game it wouldn’t even load anymore 😡😡 I’m very angry. I deleted the app and now every single one of my apps are glitching. I can’t even play music anywhere. when I go on YouTube it restricts me from every music piece now!! I can’t even listen to Taylor Swift 😡. I go to check on my horse princes and now it loads but half of the chapters won’t even load 😡🖕🖕 what is the meaning of this. I’m disappointed in this app. now I will no longer be supporting you trump. you ruined me and my ex fiances relationship. it’s our wedding day and I thought that I would be able to play music but I couldn’t even play our wedding music today so now he’s very angry at me. today is a special day because it’s our wedding day but now you ruined it for both of us. he doesn’t wanna talk, nor look at me anymore. I’m very hurt and now I’m just mad 😡😡

attributes.title: Ask for too much personal info
attributes.review: This app is the most ridiculous app I have ever used before.it looks like it any other scam artist app trying to pass by as a safe and secure app.instead it proves to be unworthy for it to be on ANYONE’S phone.please simply font get this app.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS ASS✨✨
attributes.review: This app is for mainly racist Americans. can someone please explain to me why this app is still available on the App Store? And tell me why that orange piece of garbage is still the president? He’s a racist and a rapist and he still holds the most power in America☺️?! ITS SICK!!!!!! Hi my name is Karen and I would like to speak to the manager🧚🏿‍♂️🧚🏿‍♂️

attributes.title: cheeto puff🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i read the title and i thought that it would help my dog not get hit with a ✨watermelon✨ but guess what happened YUP my dog got hit with a ✨watermelon✨ so i was recording a youtube video (Kylie and Angela) and when the 🧚✨watermelon✨🧚 exploded it sadly hit my dog (she wasn’t hurt) but there was ✨watermelon✨ juice all over her this app just gave bad karma to my dog if i didn’t have this app then my dog wouldn’t have gotten hit with a flying 🧚watermelon🧚DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP TRUMP CAN 💕💅🦋𝓢𝓱𝓾𝓽 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓯𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓾𝓹 🧚☺️💕

attributes.title: wouldnt let me poop in peace😤almost dropped my phone in the toilet
attributes.review:
LOOKIN👀 LIKE ❤️A 🌈CHEF🧑🏻‍🍳 IMMA 🧑FIVE 🖐STAR ⭐️MICHILEN🌊
i was trying to poop and i suddenly got a bunch for notifications from this app😤😤😤😤I had explosive diarrhea and almost dropped my phone in the musty poop water.made me poop even more 10/10 wouldnt download again

attributes.title: Bugs and Viruses
attributes.userName: i z z y l i t t
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever! It took 3 weeks and 5 days to download. when I opened it and tried to log in it said my email was already taken when it wasn't, and said my username was invalid everytime i tried to enter one. It glitched at 2 in the morning and started playing random music. The app has a lot of bugs and viruses and completely shut down my phone when I was trying to ex out of it to make a phone call. I do NOT reccomend this app to anyone who wants to keep up with the President.

attributes.title: This app is poop, because it made me do so
attributes.review: This app made me poop my pants. I was just minding my business, watering my tomato plants and such, when suddenly I felt my body bring the biggest bowel, blood boiling, baffling, and beginning to hurt, to my rectum. I pooped for 4 straight hours.
